title: LF Ranked duo / Clash team. Silver
body:
Looking to be apart of a clash team of hopefully active, friendly, like minded players who are trying to win but also want to enjoy themselves. 
I can play all roles to suit the team. But i play best as Adc.

Silver 5 Solo que player also looking for a similar rank for a duo. 
mic prefered. 
similar elo. 
strong champ pool. 
not a one trick. 
non toxic.

Add me in game. Hasta Manana

replies.body: join my team i need a adc
